note.p: Career: Taught Chemistry at Winchester School (1919-1920); Aldrichian Praelector in Chemistry, Oxford University; Vice Provost, Oriel, Oxford
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1967 vol 13 pp 107-124, plate, by E J Bowen
References: R L M Synge, 'How the Robinsons Nearly Invented Partition Chromatography in 1934' in NR 1992 vol 46 pp 309-311
